name: Oraret e faljes per Shqiperine
author: Laboratori.al për xhamiaime.al

sections.description:
AL
Ky plugin eshte widget per oraret e faljes ne shqiperi nga www.xhamiaime.al.
EN
This plugin is a widget salat times in Albania from www.xhamiaime.al.

Usage

  • Install and activate the plugin.
  • Use widget.

Main Features:

  • Beautiful salat times widgets for ALBANIA.
  • Easy widget panel.
  • Timetable for ALBANIA.
  • Language: ALBANIAN.

Need more features or customization?

  • Just send a mail to kontakt@laboratori.al

Credits

  • Developer: Laboratori.al per xhamiaime.al
  • E-Mail: kontakt@laboratori.al
  • Website: www.xhamiaime.al/oraret-e-faljes

This widget was realized by www.laboratori.al for www.xhamiaime.al

=3rd Party=

Laboratori.al, acting as a service provider, has developed a plugin on behalf of www.xhamiaime.al. The plugin is designed to enhance the functionality and user experience of the website. While developing this plugin, Laboratori.al has ensured that it meets the technical requirements and specifications provided by www.xhamiaime.al.

www.xhamiaime.al has stated that the statistical data collected through https://analytics.google.com/ will be used only for statistical purposes and not for any other purpose. This means that the data will be used solely to analyze and understand the behavior of users on the website, such as how they navigate the site, what pages they visit, how long they stay on each page, etc. The data will not be used to identify individual users or to create profiles of their behavior.

Link : https://www.xhamiaime.al/3rd-party
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Go to: Dashboard > Plugins > Add New > Upload.
  3. Install and activate the plugin.
  4. Done!
  5. Use widget: “Oraret e faljes per Shqiperine”.

upgrade_notice: If you want to update, you need to go to the widget and at the end of it click "See if there is an update" (See if there is an update "). Or click the link: https://www.xhamiaime.al/oraret-e-faljes-wp-update
